सत्यमेव जयते
* * *
TRANSLATION.
The song is addressed to a girl who is very beautiful. The songster says: (1) O! beautiful girl! my mind is very much pained on account of your wicked leanings. (2) Always have the name of Nebi (Muhammad) on your lips and pray for victory. (3) Let Kelima (a form of prayer) be on your tongue and do not permit satan to influence you.
